name: places/ChIJi6ErDJ5ZwokRtXeaBtnRzJI
formattedAddress: 336 E 13th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 336 E 13th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: We absolutely love this place and everyone who works there. Such a blessing to have them in the neighborhood. I’ve never had an issue with my laundry or anything short of perfect. I’ve gone to them religiously since moving back to the area over 2 years ago. They have also been wonderful kind neighbors.  Owners are Great people.

originalText.text: DO NOT GO HERE. I’ve had suspicion in the past of them stealing my clothes and stopped going there for a while . They’re right next to my apartment building I go back and gave them 5 days to properly wash my clothes . They didn’t get any of the makeup stains out which I can literally get out with dish soap and my exoensive favorite clothes are missing all they gave me back was my lounge wear . All my tops are missing . My socks are missing . My towels are missing o had about 6 towels they gave me two back . My favorite black and white silk top that’s a tube top and ties in the back is gone . They literally steal all of your nice clothes and don’t even properly wash them . I WARNED YOU DO NOT GO HERE .

originalText.text:
I've been coming here for a couple of years for drop-off service and dry cleaning. They are always professional, nice, and make the process easy and convenient. My clothes have always been ready on time. I've especially appreciated them keeping drop-off service available through this tough year. Highly recommend their services!

At one point, like most businesses, they adjusted their hours due to covid impacts, pretty sad that 00comm's is complaining about that.

originalText.text: Moved to the neighborhood in March and needed to find a new laundromat. G & M is it! The kindest staff with excellent service (drop off only). Thank you for making our laundry days so easy, breezy, and wonderful.

text.text: Moved to the neighborhood in March and needed to find a new laundromat. G & M is it! The kindest staff with excellent service (drop off only). Thank you for making our laundry days so easy, breezy, and wonderful.

originalText.text: Very nice and friendly people. Have miraculously gotten rid of terrible stains while not promising anything, always have been on time too.
